description: Unique surrogate identifier for this physical inventory detail line.
Identifier of the physical inventory event/header this line belongs to (foreign key).
Identifier of the stock item or part number being counted.
Storage location (e.g., warehouse/bin) where the item was counted.
If populated, identifies the related asset/component for this part at the location; likely optional context link; confirm with SME.
System on-hand quantity prior to the physical count; may be negative.
Quantity physically counted at the location during the inventory.
Calculated variance between counted and system quantities; negative indicates shortage, positive indicates overage.
Date/time when the physical count for this line was performed.
User or employee who performed the physical count.
Validation or processing error details for this line, if any.
Date/time when inventory balances were updated based on this count; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about this count line or observed anomalies.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this record (audit field).
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated change; appears to mirror last_modified in samples; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this record (audit field).
Timestamp when this record was created (audit field).
Identifier of the user who last modified this record (audit field).
Timestamp when a user last modified this record (audit field).
